name: reset-sizes-extension
description: Reset all size-related changes (UI zoom, editor font zoom, terminal font zoom, and optionally size-related settings) back to defaults.

resetSizes.preset.description: Preset configuration: 'zoom' resets only zoom commands, 'zoomAndSettings' also removes size settings. Select 'custom' to define your own commands and settings.
enumDescriptions: Reset zoom behaviors only (UI zoom, editor font zoom, terminal font zoom). Safe and quick.
Reset zoom behaviors AND remove custom size settings like editor.fontSize, terminal.integrated.fontSize. Restores defaults.
Define your own custom command list and settings to reset. Fully flexible.

resetSizes.commands.description: VS Code command IDs to execute when Reset All Sizes is run. Change preset to 'custom' to modify this list.
resetSizes.commands.markdownDescription:
VS Code command IDs to execute when **Reset All Sizes** is run. Examples:
- `workbench.action.zoomReset` - Reset UI zoom
- `editor.action.fontZoomReset` - Reset editor font zoom
- `workbench.action.terminal.fontZoomReset` - Reset terminal font zoom

Change preset to `custom` to modify this list.

resetSizes.settingsToReset.description: Setting keys to reset (remove custom values) when Reset All Sizes is run. Change preset to 'custom' to modify this list.
resetSizes.settingsToReset.markdownDescription:
Setting keys to reset (remove custom values) when **Reset All Sizes** is run. Examples:
- `editor.fontSize`
- `editor.lineHeight`
- `terminal.integrated.fontSize`
- `window.zoomLevel`

Change preset to `custom` to modify this list.

resetSizes.scopes.description: Configuration scopes to apply settings reset (only used when settingsToReset is not empty).

resetSizes.promptBeforeReset.description: Show confirmation dialog before removing settings (only applies if settingsToReset is not empty). Recommended to keep enabled.

resetSizes.reloadAfter.description: When to reload window after reset: never, prompt user, or always.

resetSizes.showSummaryNotification.description: Show notification with summary of reset actions.

scripts.install-local: npm run compile && npm run package && code --install-extension extension.vsix --force
